p: The overall annual incidence of RVFV antibody acquisition for the Union of Comoros was estimated at 17.54% (n[animal risk time] = 91), with a 95% confidence interval (CI) [8.95–26.14]) ( Table 2). A significant difference was found when incidence of RVFV antibody acquisition was compared between zones (Fisher exact test, p<0.001) or between islands (Fisher exact test, p<0.001) ( Table 2). Zone 5 (Moheli) incidence of RVFV antibody acquisition (72.3% 95% CI [0.255–1.000]) was significantly higher than in others zones ( Table 2).
